languages.text: "Как же вы любите размениваться с чужими жизнями, {name}". {n}Голос Кассии дрожит от ярости.{/n} "Но, пусть мне и больно это признавать, Дом Орселлио достаточно настрадался — и от ошибок Тисифоны, и от вашей "дружбы". Вы правы. Пора раз и навсегда покончить с Атласом и освободиться".

traits.locale_text: "Как же вы любите размениваться с чужими жизнями, {name}". {n}Голос Кассии дрожит от ярости.{/n} "Но, пусть мне и больно это признавать, Дом Орселлио достаточно настрадался — и от ошибок Тисифоны, и от вашей "дружбы". Вы правы. Пора раз и навсегда покончить с Атласом и освободиться".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You do love throwing other people's lives away, {name}, don't you?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "But, as much as it pains me to admit it, House Orsellio has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. You are right. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."
languages.original_text: "Как же вы любите размениваться с чужими жизнями, {name}". {n}Голос Кассии дрожит от ярости.{/n} "Но, пусть мне и больно это признавать, Дом Орселлио достаточно настрадался — и от ошибок Тисифоны, и от вашей "дружбы". Вы правы. Пора раз и навсегда покончить с Атласом и освободиться".

traits.locale_text: "You do so love throwing other people's lives away, {name}." {n}Cassia's voice shakes with fury.{/n} "But, as much as it pains me do admit it, House Orsellio has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. You are right. It is time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

You are right. It is time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

You are right. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

You are right. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

traits.locale_text: "You do love throwing other people's lives away, {name}, don't you?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "But, as much as it pains me to admit it, House Orsellio has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. You are right. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You do love throwing other people's lives away, {name}, don't you?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "But, as much as it pains me to admit it, House Orsellio has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. You are right. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「他の人民の命を捨てるのがお好みですか、{name}様？」{n}カシアの声は怒りで震えている。{/n}「しかし、大変申し上げにくいのですが、我が家門はティシフォンの過ちとあなたとの『提携』に十分苦しめられてきました。あなたのいうとおり。今こそアトラスを永遠に捨て、自由になる時が来たのです」
languages.original_text: "You do love throwing other people's lives away, {name}, don't you?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "But, as much as it pains me to admit it, House Orsellio has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. You are right. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

traits.locale_text: 「他の人民の命を捨てるのがお好みですか、{name}様？」{n}カシアの声は怒りで震えている。{/n}「しかし、大変申し上げにくいのですが、我が家門はティシフォンの過ちとあなたとの『提携』に十分苦しめられてきました。あなたのいうとおり。今こそアトラスを永遠に捨て、自由になる時が来たのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你就是很喜欢残害别人的生命，没错吧，{name}？”{n}卡西娅的声音颤抖着，愤怒不已。{/n}“不过，尽管我很不愿意承认，但奥赛罗家族已经受了太久的苦，无论是提西福涅的罪行，还是与你之间的‘联盟’。你说得没错，是时候彻底摧毁圣仪，让我们重获自由了。”
languages.original_text: "You do love throwing other people's lives away, {name}, don't you?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "But, as much as it pains me to admit it, House Orsellio has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. You are right. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

traits.locale_text: “你就是很喜欢残害别人的生命，没错吧，{name}？”{n}卡西娅的声音颤抖着，愤怒不已。{/n}“不过，尽管我很不愿意承认，但奥塞罗家族已经受了太久的苦，无论是提西福涅的罪行，还是与你之间的‘联盟’。你说得没错，是时候彻底摧毁圣仪，让我们重获自由了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « J'avais oublié à quel point vous aimiez gaspiller la vie des autres, {name}. »{n}La voix de Cassia tremble de fureur.{/n} « Cela dit, ma maison a bien assez souffert, aussi bien des erreurs de Tisiphone que de sa soi-disant alliance avec vous. Bien que cela me peine de l'admettre, vous avez raison. Il est grand temps pour nous de retrouver notre liberté. L'Atlas doit être détruit. »
languages.original_text: "You do love throwing other people's lives away, {name}, don't you?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "But, as much as it pains me to admit it, House Orsellio has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. You are right. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

traits.locale_text: « J'avais oublié à quel point vous aimiez gaspiller la vie des autres, {name}. »{n}La voix de Cassia tremble de fureur.{/n} « Cela dit, ma maison a bien assez souffert, aussi bien des erreurs de Tisiphone que de sa soi-disant alliance avec vous. Bien que cela me peine de l'admettre, vous avez raison. Il est grand temps pour nous de retrouver notre liberté. L'Atlas doit être détruit. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Usted disfruta acabando con las vidas de los demás, ¿no es así, {name}?». {n}La voz de Cassia tiembla de ira.{/n} «Pero, por más que me duela admitirlo, la casa Orsellio ya ha sufrido más que suficiente, tanto por los errores de Tisiphone como por su "alianza" con usted. Tiene razón. Es hora de que nos deshagamos del Atlas de una vez por todas y quedemos libres de esa maldad».
languages.original_text: "You do love throwing other people's lives away, {name}, don't you?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "But, as much as it pains me to admit it, House Orsellio has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. You are right. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

traits.locale_text: «Usted disfruta acabando con las vidas de los demás, ¿no es así, {name}?». {n}La voz de Cassia tiembla de ira.{/n} «Pero, por más que me duela admitirlo, la casa Orsellio ya ha sufrido más que suficiente, tanto por los errores de Tisiphone como por su "alianza" con usted. Tiene razón. Es hora de que nos deshagamos del Atlas de una vez por todas y quedemos libres de esa maldad».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr liebt es einfach, die Leben anderer wegzuwerfen, {name}, nicht wahr?" {n}Cassias Stimme bebt vor Wut.{/n} "Aber so sehr es mich auch schmerzt, das einzugestehen, Haus Orsellio hat lang genug gelitten, sowohl durch Tisiphones Fehlern als auch durch sein 'Bündnis' mit Euch. Ihr habt recht. Es wird höchste Zeit, dass wir den Atlas vernichten und uns endlich ein für alle Mal befreien."
languages.original_text: "You do love throwing other people's lives away, {name}, don't you?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "But, as much as it pains me to admit it, House Orsellio has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. You are right. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr liebt es einfach, die Leben anderer wegzuwerfen, {name}, nicht wahr?" {n}Cassias Stimme bebt vor Wut.{/n} "Aber so sehr es mich auch schmerzt, das einzugestehen, Haus Orsellio hat lang genug gelitten, sowohl durch Tisiphones Fehlern als auch durch sein 'Bündnis' mit Euch. Ihr habt recht. Es wird höchste Zeit, dass wir den Atlas vernichten und uns endlich ein für alle Mal befreien."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Başka insanların canının senin için hiç değeri yok, değil mi {name}?" {n}Cassia'nın sesi, öfkeyle titriyor.{/n} "Bunu kabullenmek içimi acıtsa da Orsellio Hanesi, hem Tisiphone'nin hatalarından hem de seninle 'ittifakımızdan' çok çekti. Atlas'tan kalıcı olarak kurtulup sonunda özgür kalmamızın vakti geldi de geçiyor."
languages.original_text: "You do love throwing other people's lives away, {name}, don't you?" {n}Cassia's voice quivers with fury.{/n} "But, as much as it pains me to admit it, House Orsellio has suffered long enough, both from Tisiphone's mistakes and its 'alliance' with you. You are right. It is high time we disposed of the Atlas for good and finally freed ourselves."

traits.locale_text: "Başka insanların canının senin için hiç değeri yok, değil mi {name}?" {n}Cassia'nın sesi, öfkeyle titriyor.{/n} "Bunu kabullenmek içimi acıtsa da; Orsellio Hanesi, hem Tisiphone'nin hatalarından hem de seninle 'ittifakımız'dan çok çekti. Atlas'tan kalıcı olarak kurtulup sonunda özgür kalmamızın vakti geldi de geçiyor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
